  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display(int size, fr.nicoGames.tictactoe.Cell[] board)
      Display the Tic Tac Toe board. This method displays the Tic Tac Toe board with the representation symbols of the cells. Each row and column is separated by delimiter lines.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the board (square).
      board - The game board constructed with the fr.nicoGames.tictactoe.Cell class.
      See Also:
      • fr.nicoGames.tictactoe.Cell.getRepresentation()

    • chooseNewGame

      public void chooseNewGame()
      Displays the options for choosing a new game.

    • getCoordonatesAi

      public void getCoordonatesAi(int[] coordonnate)
      Displays the coordinates of the AI player.
      Parameters:
      coordonnate - Array of the player's coordinates.

    • getWinner

      public void getWinner(fr.nicoGames.tictactoe.Player currentPlayer)
      Displays the winner of the game.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The winning player.

    • getGameOverMessage
